question:
[Sarah] and her daughter [Mary] went to see a movie yesterday and then got ice cream afterwards. [Oscar] took his favorite son [Daniel] to a baseball game where he caught a foul ball as a souvenir. [Mary] was always arguing with her mother's husband [Carlos]. [Mary] went shoe shopping with her sister [Julie]. [Julie] went to the store with her sister [Mary] [Jamie]'s mother [Sarah] was teaching her how to teach when [Jamie]'s husband [Daniel] arrived home. [Carlos] took his son [Gregory] out for ice cream.
Question: How is [Oscar] related to [Gregory]?
